entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
